title: Amazing Changes to Dragons (Please implement ASAP)
body:
Dragon Changes (Please implement immediately)

When dragons die, they now drop 4 eggs - A White egg, a Red Egg, a Green Egg, and a Brown Egg. These eggs have 1 lifepoint and when they are attacked, they open and all others are destroyed. The egg that is selected/opened becomes the next drake that will appear in 5 minutes. If no egg is destroyed in 15 seconds, the next dragon is random.

I really like this idea because it removes all of the RnG from the game (besides the very first dragon), and encourages early dragon control. It also works well enough theatrically.


Some teams may benefit from certain dragons more than others, so the current state of the game should favor the team with more skill, not the team with more luck

If you don't like the idea, consider how you would feel if this was the way dragons already spawned. Would you change the game to make them all random?
